name: Hiyake no Omoide & Himekuri: Girls in Motion Puzzle Vol. 1
description: Puzzle game released for the Sega Saturn in 1996. It was followed by Girls in Motion Puzzle Vol. 2

name: Small on Top
description: "Small on Top" is a full on adult furry RPG with character driven events and narrative. It follows the Adventurer as he tries to find out why he woke up in the forest.

name: Conquer Antarctica
description: A turn-based combat Flash game where 2 penguins must battle other penguins floating on icebergs. Either deplete the opponents' HP or knock them off their icebergs; the last penguin standing wins! The game is the predecessor to Raft Wars, a 2007 Flash game using the same art style, objects, physics, and sound effects.

name: P-Racing
description: P-Racing is an action-racing game for Playdate.

name: Don't Eat the Mushroom
description: A short mod of Knytt Stories where a young girl is asked to deliver a package for her mother. Adds in new levels, music, and a few other surprises!

name: Super Mario Bros. Square Root 5
description: To say "Princess Peach! Kidnapped" and or, that you say, especially at this late hour is not. The "extra" to torment the Mario "shortage". That’s it. Tricks are required!

name: Cheetahmen III
description:
In 1994, third game in the Cheetahmen series was in development for the Action Gamemaster, a handheld multi-cartridge and CD-ROM clone console that was being developed by Active Enterprises at the time. The game was announced at the 1994's Consumer Electronics Show, alongside the console itself.

The game was later silently cancelled alongside the Action Gamemaster and Cheetahmen II.

name: Action 52
description: An unreleased SNES port for Action 52.

name: Axon TD: Uprising
description: From the developers of Element TD 2 comes a Mazing Tower Defense where you can expand the map layout itself. A huge arsenal of towers and a wide variety of enemies clash in a battlefield that shifts on your whims. Engage in single, cooperative, or roguelite gameplay.

name: The Vampire(?) Detective and the Case of the Lying Maid
description: Enid had a crush on her eccentric lady Olivia for as long as she can remember, but she'll rather die than admit it. One day, she's summoned to Olivia's study for an unclear reason...

name: King of the Arcade
description: Featuring over 40 Playable games, King of the Arcade lets you play as former Champ Mac McCormick, fighting to save Castle's Arcade from a hostile takeover. With epic boss battles and an open-world arcade, reclaim your title as King in this ultimate Arcade experience.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Shikaku
description: "Shikaku" is one of Nikoli's own original casse-tête, with simple rules and a unique feeling of solution. Until you get used to it, you'll tend to solve the casse-tête with guesswork, but the real charm lies in solving them with logic. Once you master the method of solving the casse-tête by gradually stretching squares from the numbers, you'll be able to enjoy "Shikaku" on an even deeper level.

name: Driving School Classics 2019
description:
Driving School Classics is the latest driving simulator that will allow you to drive many classic cars, including muscle cars, supercars, SUVs, Buses, Trucks and many more. Driving School Classics has tons of levels across many environments: cities, mountains, deserts, etc...
Drive a manual transmission with clutch and stick shift or take it easy with the automatic gearbox. Intuitive controls will make this the best driving simulator, use a virtual steering wheel, buttons or tilt your device.

name: Car Rush II
description:
Car Rush II is action racing game. You must move left or right to avoid other cars.
if you hit other cars your speed is down. Drive as far as you can and break the you or friend's record in limited time.

name: Touch Racing 2
description: Race extreme speed cars, offroad rally vehicles & power boats in this awesome arcade R/C racing game!

name: Goal Finger
description:
Goal Finger is a simple, tactical game… just like football (soccer)! But you won't need any football (soccer) shoes here, just your fingers and eyes!
Got 5 free minutes? Take on players from all over the world in action-packed matches where every move counts. Anticipate, bluff… it's no-holds-barred!
Train your players to increase their performance levels, recruit new players, or put together your dream team with the international stars of the Goal Finger game!

name: Pixel Volley
description:
Get ready for the wackiest game of volleyball you've ever played. Tap to make your heroes jump and knock the ball onto the opponent's court...with your head!
Play with over 50 characters and explore unique settings as you compete for the Pixel Volley crown!

name: Soccer Dribble Cup: High Score
description: Only 3 rules: Dribble through all defenders, Reach opponent goal, Shoot to score!!!

name: The Hit Car
description:
The Hit Car is a car driving - invasion preventing simulator.
Earth has been affected with the every possible threats. Aliens, zombies and even robots are already here and your job it to get rid of them.
Collect the coins to buy car upgrades and the powerful weapons.
Hit, shoot, and smash anything that stands in your way and show to everyone how good you are on online leaderboards.

name: Piano City: Spring Music Festival Story
description:
The whole Piano City awaits - now everyone can feel like a real rock star! Playing the piano was never so fun and easy!
Play classic music and modern hits alike, featuring SIA, OneRepublic, Maroon 5, Imagine Dragons, Cranberries and others. Progress through the map, complete diverse musical quests and show the world who is the real star!

name: Snaileeyo Save Them
description:
Go with the heroic Snaileeyo and explore vibrant new worlds, solve challenging of obstacles, fight enemies and save your friends.
Slither across brilliant islands, haunting deserts, scorching volcanic mountains and crystal palaces.
Enjoy intuitive controls, smooth HD graphics and original music.
Gain special powers: fly, blast fireballs, lay decoys, and grow mega huge to topple your foes!
Find all your friends and unlock the true ending. Treat yourself to an unforgettable, fun-filled adventure! Brought to you by the indie game studio, Bezenyo!

name: Tainted Treasure
description:
Reach the bottom of the tainted cave in this reaction-battle roguelike!
In order to uncover the mystery of the secret treasure, you have to reach the lowest level of the tainted cave. But this will be no easy feat as there are countless corrupted enemies standing in your way.

name: Delicious in Dungeon
description: A simple, easy to play roguelike game where all you have to do is choose which way to go, left or right! Each game takes about 30 minutes to play, but with the auto-save feature, you can play even if you have only 3 minutes to spare.

name: Galaxy Feud
description:
Battle against friends online in epic battles in space. Earn credits and XP and upgrade your 5 individual spaceships with amazingly powerful weapons.
Galaxy Feud is a game that can be played by anyone. Built on familiar game mechanics to bring you a unique gaming experience with an incredible amount of gaming styles available.

name: Treasure Submarine
description:
Based on a classic strategy game, Treasure Submarine brings a whole new experience to your iOS devices with a new twist.
Your aim is to sink all the battleships, warships, destroyers, etc hidden under the sea using supplied weapons. Also, try to find a treasure submarine that carries some super weapons!
This is a fun and easy-to-play strategy game for kids and the whole family.

name: Safari Chess
description:
Play the multiplayer mode online with friends or try the single player mode to challenge and ultimately defeat the Dragon Master.
Smooth and appealing graphics, animation suitable for all age groups.

name: Prime Jump
description: Prime Jump is a minimalist high score chaser. With just one tap, you can jump, reverse gravity, and swing.

name: Mr. Right
description:
Wanna be Mr. Right? Just keep turning Right!
Being late in his wedding day, with your help, will Mr. Right get the church in time, or lost his bride forever?
All you need to do is to keep turning. But only with both intelligent brain and smart reaction you can help Mr. Right to come through this chaotic city.
More importantly, collect all the suits, be a charming Mr. Right!

name: CyberTac
description: CyberTac is a 3d vehicle combat game. Dodge and weave your way around the levels as you engage the enemies. Tactical powerups let you strategize best course of action. Frontal assault all guns blazing or quick in and out strikes while you shield yourself. You choose the best strategy!

name: Find The Candy
description: Look for candy everywhere. It is very well hidden. Sometimes it will have to strain the brain and not trivial to solve the puzzle. Move books, unlock chests, collect gifts and more to find that candy! Don't forget to check every part for stars too, they like to blend in with the surroundings.

name: Speedy Sparrow
description:
Help Speedy Sparrow struggle with a group of stubborn ladybugs!
Your task is really simple - touch ladybugs to make Speedy Sparrow peck them. None of the ladybugs can leave the borders!
Along with collecting points you may unlock new types of ladybugs, which will have completely new features and will allow you to get more points!
You will meet toxic ladybugs you shouldn’t mess with, armored ladybugs or even ladybugs sending bullets towards you…
During the game you can also make combos (by pecking two or more ladybugs at one stroke) and get even more points. Good luck!

name: Activision Flashback Blast!
description:
The Activision Flashback Blast! features twenty Atari 2600 games:

Atlantis
Beamrider
Chopper Command
Cosmic Commuter
Crackpots
Decathlon
Dragster
Enduro
Fishing Derby
Freeway
Frostbite
H.E.R.O.
Keystone Kapers
Megamania
Pitfall!
Pressure Cooker
River Raid
Seaquest
Stampede
Starmaster
The system is completely self-contained in an HDMI dongle and uses wireless controllers for gameplay. While the system only includes one controller, additional ones are available separately.

name: Bandai Namco Flashback Blast!
description:
Have a Blast! with the home versions of the greatest arcade classics of all time. Play Pac-Man, Dig Dug, Mappy and take control of some real characters. Or better yet, blast into outer space and take on attacking alien hordes with your Galaxip starfighter in Galaxian. The fun is out-of-this-world with these timeless video game favorites!.

Features 8 of the greatest classic Atari games built-in: Pac-Man, Dig Dug, Galaga, Galaxian, Mappy, Sky Kid, The Tower of Druaga, Xevious

name: ColecoVision Flashback
description: Sin descripción

name: Intellivision Flashback
description: Sin descripción

name: Legends Flashback Blast!
description:
The Legends Flashback Blast! features twelve Atari 2600 games:

BurgerTime
Bump 'N' Jump (Burnin' Rubber)
Escape It!
Front Line
Jungle Hunt
Lock 'n' Chase
Miss It!
Polaris
Shield Shifter
Space Invaders
Space Raid
Strip Off
The system is completely self-contained in an HDMI dongle and uses wireless controllers for gameplay. While the system only includes one controller, additional pads are available separately.

name: Sega Genesis Classic Game Console
description: Sin descripción

name: Null
description: Null is a murder mystery and social deduction game with time travel elements.

name: Metroid Fusion: NES Version
description:
A hack of the original Metroid to make it feel like the 4th game on the GBA: Metroid Fusion.

Kraid has been changed to Arachnus, Ridley has been changed to the SA-X, and the layout is inspired by Fusion’s map. Samus uses her Fusion Suit colors as well. All 6 sectors could not be exactly recreated, but the flow of the game should be there

name: Oha Suta Dance Dance Revolution
description: Oha Suta Dance Dance Revolution is a Japan-exclusive DDR that primarily features songs from the kids show Oha Suta. There are a few Konami original songs thrown in for good measure.

name: LetterSchmetter
description:
LetterSchmetter is a new browser game, which is currently still in closed beta. In this game you have to form words from an anagram in German. The individual letters bring different points, whereby the rounds become more difficult after each solved turn. The game is available for Twitch and is intended as a community game, since the entire chat is involved.
In addition, undiscovered words are displayed, so that there is also a learning effect here.

The name "LetterSchmetter" is a mixture of the English word "Letter" and the German word "Schmetter" (means to bounce something at high speed on a surface).

At the moment 25 german streamers are involved and test all functions live in their streams.
If the Beta finished, the german community have a new game.

After the released were planned to run the game in english, spanish and french language after a short period of release time.

name: Buccanyar
description: The game consists of two major parts: a nautical mode in which you operate your own ship with AI cats (crew) and go on adventures, fighting other ships and sea monsters, and a port mode in which you customize your ship, replace crew, and cash in resources obtained in battle.

name: Sega Astro City Mini
description:
The Astro City Mini is a functional miniature version of the full-sized arcade cabinet that goes by the same name, and it includes 37 playable games.

The Mini features a built-in LCD screen, but if you’re interested in the bigger picture, it also includes an HDMI-out port, a headphone jack, and two USB-A ports.

name: Battle Bakraid Unlimited Ver.
description: Sin descripción

name: Sega Astro City Mini V
description: Faithful reproduction of the arcade cabinet "Astro City" at 1/6 size. At the time of the original release, this was released as a resin console. Similar to the original "Astro City" the main body is reproduced with resin. By adopting a 4.6-inch vertical LCD monitor, the original design arcade cabinet is now the size of your palm!

name: Children of Morn
description: Children of Morn is an erotic adventure and sandbox game set in a dark fantasy world full of vicious demons and alluring witches.

name: Hidden Agenda
description: Sin descripción

name: Hide and Seek
description: A "ball-in-a-cup" game with sheep in haystacks. Possibly a modified Lonely Island minigame.

name: Dominant Amber
description: A reskin of Dominant Color.

name: Jura Formula
description: Sin descripción

name: Lost World Sudoku
description: Sin descripción

name: Meatloaf Rotation
description: A reskin of Logic Dial.

name: Mya Master Mind
description: A reskin of Bulls and Cows.

name: Skeleton Scale
description: Sin descripción

name: Yawning Triceratops
description: Sin descripción

name: T-Rex Memory Match
description: Sin descripción

name: Blue Flow
description:
2005 real-time mecha strategy game by Kogado Studio's Iruka Team. Released for Windows PCs. Prequel to the 2006 title Blue Blaster.

Created as an attempt to make a more beginner-friendly version of Power Dolls, however the gameplay resembles something akin to Rasetsu, also developed by Iruka Team.

The story is told through Visual Novel sections along with events during combat sections.

name: Hololive CouncilRyS RPG
description: Hololive CouncilRyS RPG is a fangame and love letter to Hololive CouncilRyS, built in RPG Maker MZ with custom art assets by me and original musical arrangements of Hololive songs by Jeremy Robson. Expect the game to be about 3 hours long.

name: One week, My room
description: A week in just five minutes. A closed off room, just eight tatami in size. A small world for you to save. This game is a puzzle adventure that takes from thirty minutes to an hour to play through.

name: My Mini Farm
description:
Embark on a relaxing yet challenging journey of managing your own mini farm.
Grow organic plants, harvest your crops, take care of animals and sell products to fair buyers.
Hire, build and expand your holdings!
Can you turn your Mini Farm into an empire?

name: Mahjong School
description:
"Mahjong School" is a beautiful girl + eliminate mahjong leisure game.
Players should find out three same mahjong cards in the game and eliminate them, but it should be noted that they will occupy the grid before finding them together!

name: Judgment Day: Angel of God
description: It is Judgment Day and here you are. OMG! As the Angel of God, you are in charge of judgment on the reckoning day! It is your mission, you are in charge of judging and determining all souls’ afterlife destiny! Play the best of heaven or hell games.

name: Merge Archers: Bow and Arrow
description: Are you ready to fight for your king? Notch your arrows and join the war of bow and arrow! Merge bowmasters and create the strongest stickman archery squad to defend the castle. Play one of the coolest arrow games, become the greatest stickman archer hero and win the bow and arrow war!

name: Xenoblade Chronicles 2: Expansion Pass
description: If you own the Xenoblade Chronicles 2 game and buy this Expansion Pass, you’ll gain access to some titanic new content, including new Rare Blades such as Shulk and Fiora, bonus items, new quests, Challenge Battle mode, and the new stand-alone game, Xenoblade Chronicles 2: Torna ~ The Golden Country!

name: DVD Karaoke Game DVT-G100
description: Tectoy's DVD Karaoke Game DVT-G100 is a DVD player, a karaoke machine and a dedicated console all built in one single machine. It comes with two six-button controllers and was marketed to include 100 built-in SEGA Master System and Game Gear games, though the total sum is 102 when counting 20 games for 20 em 1 and 10 games for Pense Bem.

name: Monuments to Guilt
description: Take a first-person wander through Monuments to Guilt, a short exhibition exploring exclusionary design. Acquaint yourself with the core principles of this harmful practice, re-evaluate the objects you see every day and let guilt sit with you, for just a little while.

name: Metal: Hellsinger - Dream of the Beast
description: In the Dream of the Beast DLC, make the Hells fear the beat with two new songs (Cristina Scabbia from Lacuna Coil and Will Ramos from Lorna Shore), a new weapon, and three outfits with unique gameplay bonuses.

name: Crash Bandicoot: Back In Time
description: A love letter to Crash Bandicoot in the form of a game that features 5 traditional levels, 5 flashback tape levels, time trials and the Crash Creator: an awesome level creator.

name: DVD Dancemachine DVT-F800
description:
Tectoy's DVD Dancemachine DVT-F800 is a DVD player, a karaoke machine and a dedicated console all built in one single machine. It comes with one gamepad identical to the original SEGA Master System controller and a dance pad. It has 4 buit-in games, two played with the dance pad and two with the gamepad; each game has five songs and three difficulty levels. The included games are:

Let´s Dance: a dance game to be played by one or two players with the dance pad.

Movin': a singing and dance game for up to 4 players. In doubles, one player sings and the other dances according to the patterns shown on screen.

Rock Show: a game similar to Guitar Hero, but instead of using a guitar controller the player uses the gamepad to press the notes as they scroll down the screen.

Beat Game: a game for up to four players. In doubles, one player sings and the other plays the selected instrument (guitar, drums or keyboards) using the gamepad.

name: Let's Dance
description: Sin descripción

name: Movin'
description: Sin descripción

name: Rock Show
description: Sin descripción

name: Beat Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Bubble Bop
description: Sin descripción

name: Sandy's Surf Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Invasion of the Hooks
description: Sin descripción

name: Patrick and the Maze
description: Sin descripción

name: The Super Chum Bucket
description: Sin descripción

name: Panic Museum
description: Panic Museum, titled Haunted Museum (ホーンテッド ミュージアム) in Japan originally, is a light gun arcade cabinet game created by Taito and developed by GameWax. The game sees you as two investigators solving a case of several missing persons that leads you to a museum, you and your light gun partner get trapped inside by supernatural forces. What follows is a series of exhibits come to life and worlds forming around our characters as they must shoot their way through each encounter and deal with mummies, dinosaurs, and more. This is the first game in the Haunted Mansion series of games, the sequel being "Shh...! Welcome to Frightfearland".

name: The Aether II
description:
The Aether II is the sequel to the highly popular dimension mod "The Aether", set in a hostile paradise miles up in the clouds, the Aether is an entirely different world from what regular players are used to, filled with fantastic creatures and mysterious structures, the Aether is a world brimming with life and history. You'll have to relearn key ideas as the Aether challenges you with twisted materials, terrifying monsters and deep lore if you want to survive and prosper in this strange new land.

As the mod comes closer to a final release, Dungeons, Biomes, NPC settlements will pepper the landscape, offering new and exciting challenges and experiences unique to this mysterious world.

name: Mr. Brocco & Co.
description: Mr. Brocco & Co is a classic 2D platform game set in a fantasy world where junk food is trying to take over! Choose one of two characters (Mr. Broccoli or Super Asparagus) to save the city!

name: Asterism
description: Asterism is an interactive music album. A digital series of playable music videos that allow exploration and interaction within hand-crafted worlds that relate to the narrative of each music track. The narrative follows themes around personal expression, self-acceptance, anxiety and mental health.

name: VR Fitness
description: Easy fitness in VR! A wealth of customisable elements to keep you going! Complete badges and hidden elements as you exercise!

name: Arcade Archives: Dig Dug II
description: This marks an exciting comeback!

name: Ride 5
description: Rev up your engine and get ready to hit the track with RIDE 5. An adrenaline-filled gaming experience that is so authentic it will make you feel like you're truly racing at break-neck speed. Find your favorite bikes and check out new ones in the ultimate motorcycle game! Race on over 35 tracks and collect more than 200 motorcycles from world-renowned manufacturers, each element is designed to feel like you're riding a real bike.

name: Rubberduck Wave Racer
description: Be a duckling - a squeaky duckling!

name: Love Challenge
description: You are a retired male whore with a villa on the hill. On this day, three beauties came out of nowhere to seek help. Taking advantage of the opportunity of the three beauties spending the night, use your expertise to make them willing to sleep with you without the other two beauties knowing.

name: Beverage Craft
description: Run Your Own Beverage Shop !

name: Xenocide
description: Preserve the hierarchy of humanity's distant mechanical children by cleansing the galaxy in this transhumanist turn-based tactical tale. Capture resources from unworthy machines and summon powerful AI spirits to grow your faction's fleets of vessels blessed by Man the All-Maker.

name: Yogurt: Wet Dreams
description: Yogurt: Wet Dreams! - a clicker with a lot of beautiful girls! You must collect all the girls, for this you need to bring them to the peak with your clicks! Each girl is animated, voiced and emotional!

name: Wizard's Watch
description: You are a wizard and your village is under attack! Push back the enemy forces with powerful spells. Burn, freeze, shatter and crush the enemy soldiers with your magic powers. Gain XP as you kill your enemies and unlock upgrades for your spells.

name: Up All Night: Daybreak
description: Nick just can't let go of the people he's killed.

name: Way of the Bullet
description: Shoot, dash and slice your way to victory in this rogue-lite FPS! Discover new weapons, spells and game modes as you progress through a series of procedurally-generated levels. Face hordes of enemies and bosses as you fight solo or in a 3 player co-op.

name: Snake Escape
description: Snake like you've never seen before... Traverse through portals, teleport around the map, and phase through walls in over 150 unique levels! Free Demo coming soon!

name: Sex Room 2: 18+
description: SEX Room 2 [18+] is a steamy and seductive casual clicker game. Sex Room 2 [18+] is a game that invites you to immerse yourself in a world of passion and pleasure. You can upgrade generators and clickers, purchase new sex toys, and enjoy adult content

name: Sisyphus.12.20.03
description: In a world of no humans, a robot remains. Voiced by Kakos Xamos.

name: SkyVerse
description: SkyVerse is a sandbox set in a procedurally generated world of floating islands. As a captain, you can expand your base, improve your engines, decorate it, and explore the world to discover new items and fight the evil within dungeons. The higher you go, the more challenging the game becomes!

name: Slime-ing
description: In 'Sliming, players must navigate the slime through numerous obstacles to reach its destination by bouncing it. The control of avoiding obstacles such as spikes, saw blades, and moving platforms creates a thrilling experience for players.

name: Slingshell, by Muno!
description: SLINGSHELL is an arcade high-score shooter / platformer where you play as a cloud-riding, gun-slinging snail and brave the dangers of enemy-filled, randomly-generated levels. Master the unorthodox controls of a varied cast of characters, all while enjoying beautiful pixel art and a jazzy soundtrack!

name: Soulvester vs. Lil' Beezey
description: Show Lil' Beezey who the boss of Winkletown is in this addictive and fast paced 2D action roguelite! Created from scratch in only 14 days and nominated for GDWC Game Jam GOTY, Soulvester comes to Steam for the first time, now with controller support and achievements!

name: Super Soakdown
description: Super Soakdown is a fun and cartoony multiplayer third-person shooter game about cats with water guns. Play with friends or against bots in this bright western world.

name: The Artist: Act One
description: Do you feel good where you are? Some people do, some don't even if they have everything in the world. Does love fix that sort of feeling, even if such feelings feel so hard to grasp and such love could be toxic to yourself? What is a loving muse to the artist who paints them?

name: Tales of Seikyu
description: "Tales of Seikyu" is a fantasy farming sim game set in a lost fae land called Seikyu, inhabited by legendary creatures. However, the town is frequently threatened by the old gods' forces. As a new arrival, can you successfully manage the old inn entrusted to you by God Inari?

name: The Witch, Wife, & the Wish
description: Once upon a time, there was a witch who lived in the middle of a forest. Rumors said that even the witch was cursed herself, but the witch had long forgotten what spell had been cast, until one day a brave young man came to ask a favor of the witch, for his ailing wife.

name: RollerBall
description: Roll the ball, collect the crystals, avoid obstacles. Don't fall.

name: Forgotten Journey
description: Explore an open world with a vibrant ecosystem, learn more about the creatures, the world and take beautiful photos along the way.

name: Mechanic Story
description:
Victory loves preparation!
Boys will always be boys and they love to ride, brake and fix the cars. Bring your top car workshop in your smartphone today, if you wanna win the real race tomorrow.
A role playing and informative game where whole city owns the car but no one knows how to carry them, But its time for you to fix them all. Be a passionate Mechanic and upgrade a long queue of cars in your performance shop, paint shop, car wash center and modification studio. Set the right tune and right attitude of racing cars.

name: Picme
description: Follow the life of 5 women as they discover their desires, while solving nonograms (picross) puzzles.

name: PieClicker
description: PieClicker is a beautiful clicker game designed to be visually appealing. Click, Get Pies, Upgrade Pies.

name: Puppetmaster: Pose Viewer
description: The Puppetmaster Pose-Viewer is the next, new 3DX innovation from the team that brought you Sensual Adventures! This PC-only software application will let you watch and play with Brittany, Trinity, Jasmine, Marcia, Livia and Alexandra in almost any way you like.

name: Road to Salvation
description: Road To Salvation is a stylized action adventure game. This is where the world is ruined. Your daughter, who was the only thing that connects you to this difficult life, has been kidnapped. Fight to save, do you have the courage to negotiate? You may even have to die. Can you do these?

name: Run a Café
description: Run a Café is a game where you do just that, run a Café! Make drinks from regular coffee, to iced flavored coffees and even serve food! Manage your inventory and time efficiently to ensure you maximize every customer! Start from nothing and build a full scale, dine-in Café!

name: Saucers
description: Saucers is a rogue-lite top-down arena style shooter featuring extensive weaponry and upgrade paths so that every run is unique. The further you get, the more weaponry you can stack up to devastating effect.

name: Threat Actor
description: Threat Actor is a story rich, cybercrime-themed game, where you, an infamous hacker and paranoid owner of an underground marketplace, are ready to do whatever it takes to secure the legacy of your business as one of the most luxurious trading sites on the Dark Web.

name: Motocross Mayhem
description: The strategy of Motocross Mayhem is simple, race each track and perform as many tricks as possible during the race. Perform the most tricks during the race and win first place you will win the race prize money and move on to the next race.

name: Tentaizu
description: Tentaizu is a must have application for players who enjoy puzzle games. Tentaizu requires players to use logic and follow the clues provided to find the hidden 10 stars. It is useful to develop math sense on algebra, logical, analytical, and reasoning ability.

name: Zany Bounce
description:
React quick in this fast-paced 3D paddle game that will test your reflexes!
Zany Bounce adds many modern twists to this popular genre of 3D pong games. Curve your way past the computer AI to get the high score. Do you have what it takes to get to level 20?

name: My Illegal Cafe
description: A game where you end up accidentally running a clandestine cafe in a world filled with cute catgirls.

name: Model Eight
description: A shoot em' up with a manga inspired look. Destroy enemies, and use their salvage to gain more power.

name: Mirthwood
description: Embark on an enchanting journey and brave ferocious creatures in an immersive medieval fantasy world. Will you settle a new homestead to live a life of farming and trade, or pick up the sword and take up the adventurers' path?

name: Marionette Mates
description: Marionette Mates is a powerful pngtuber application with multiplayer support. Marionette Mates allows you to use the provided assets or ones you create as virtual avatars to create an online presence alone or with friends.

name: Lured
description: Lured is a 3-player co-op puzzle adventure. A previous team of explorers were lost trying to uncover a lost ancient secret, it's up to you and your 2 partners to uncover the mystery. Strong teamwork is the key to overcoming the traps and puzzles you discover. Will you find the truth?

name: Dawnfolk
description: Minimalist and relaxing survival builder perfect for short gaming sessions. Rebuild and manage your realm, collect resources and decide the fate of your people. Explore the darkness and unveil the secrets of the black monoliths to bring back light to the world.

name: Sweet Sins: Kawaii Run
description:
Don’t be fooled by the utterly kawaii art style, Sweet Sins is an endless runner like you have never seen: it’s fast, it’s challenging, it’s evil and yup, it’s also extremely cute. If you’re looking for an old school arcade challenge, your search ends right here.
Sweet Sins is an original infinite runner where you lead Luna, Sandy, Rica, Nana, Red, Ivy and Moira on their journey! Very easy to play but hard to master!

name: FlapTap Jo
description:
Fly as far as possible. Tap the screen and try to avoid obstacles.
Compete with other players and try to reach the top of the high score.

name: Frozen Free Fall: Icy Shot
description:
Adventure into the stunning world of Frozen to experience an ice–shattering collection of new puzzles and excitement!
Join Queen Elsa, Anna, Olaf and a few mischievous Snowgies on a whimsical journey! Shoot snowballs with ice magic, earn unique boosters and discover special surprises around every turn. For the first time in forever, you can enjoy Frozen like never before!

name: Super Pet Hero
description:
Take the control of the Ninja or one of his friends and save all the cute pets from dangerous crossroads. Join our crew of rescue heroes and take the pets to safety. Gather coins from the busy crossroad and on top of running cars to unlock all the pet rescue heroes.
The Ninja and his friends have a tough mission, to rescue fuzzy and cute animals from a busy crossroad. Cats, dogs, pandas and even pigs and unicorns await you! Climb the leaderboards and achieve a high score in this action packed pet rescue adventure.

name: Neon Survivors
description: ANNIHILATE a small army's worth of ghouls, knaves and miners, with the power of lasers, missiles and kidneys! You're alone against these hordes with nothing but INCREDIBLE WEAPONRY and MURDEROUS INTENT. Can you survive for FOUR MINUTES?

name: Neurosis
description: Neurosis is a first-person philosophical horror game that takes place inside the nightmare of a lonely child. Solve puzzles and traverse the dream world while revisiting and reliving your past to overcome your fears. Will you be able to escape the nightmare while avoiding the dangers within?

name: Dr. Maria
description:
Dr. Mary is a classic minigame, in which you are playing as a doctor to kill the bacteria with different capsules.
Match four or more colors either horizontally or vertically to delete them. Each level is completed when all of the bacterias have been defeated.

name: Nidus
description: Emerge into Nidus as a mind-bending Symbiotic Duo. Control Two Characters Simultaneously in challenging Twin-Stick Top-Down Arena gameplay. Gather power, devour the swarm, and shine brilliantly as your strive to complete the mesmerizing collective lifecycle.

name: Open Spaces SE
description: Skylar is an student with anxiety. Walter is a farmer with social anxiety and PTSD. Jessica is a programmer with anxiety and agoraphobia. Li Wei is an technologist with intense anxiety. Navigate their stories, learn how they move through the world, and about methods of treatment and recovery.

name: Paradise Sex
description: Paradise Sex - is the simplest 2D puzzle that you will remember with its hot images.

name: Pickup Artist Trouble
description: Alex is a pickup artist who scams single, lonely young men for money. Now he created a mob that is coming after him. They took his books and scattered them around different locations. Help Alex get his books back so that he can find success while scamming more men.

name: Super Zeek
description: Just touch and lead Zeek to get mushroom, and avoid bad pink flower!

name: Hentai Puzzles: Attack on Tight Panties
description: Meet Jaimie and Emma in this Hentai puzzle game.

name: Hentai Casual Jigsaw: Witches
description: Enjoy our new line of puzzles with Hentai Casual Jigsaw - Witches! With a lot of gorgeous illustrations of beautiful witches and with an open gallery for you to relax and enjoy!

name: Green Squares
description: Pure Simple Physics Fun. Green Squares is A physics based time trial, where there are green squares, that need to be not green!

name: Float
description: Control a bear cub, collect food, plant fruit trees, build rooms, grab food from enemies, and fight.

name: Finland Corruption Simulator
description: experience boring life in simulator game and this will just is it finland corruption simulator and then you can just play it nothing intresting so do what ever you want in game what you will can so basically nothing

name: Entogious
description: Kill an angel in a real-time-turn-based combat style thats COMPLETELY UNFAIR and take it’s heart. Die 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 times who cares? Become the richest man alive. Hmmmm COWS?!?!!.

name: Endless Anime Golf
description: Are you an anime lover with a passion for golf? This exciting game combines the best of both worlds, with stunning anime visuals and challenging golf gameplay. Best of all, Endless Anime Golf features procedural generation, which means every round is unique and unpredictable.

name: Don't Beg for Help
description: A horror visual novel game with "Tales from the Crypt" style plot.

name: The Kingpin
description: Kingpin is a popular, tactical board game, today available also for iOS users. It takes place in a dark city. The players are involved in the fight between four crime groups: the Russian Mob, the Italian Mafia, the Colombian Cartel and the Yakuza. Shootings, murders and robberies happen very often. The city can be ruled only by one group. Users have to choose their mafia and do their best to support it. In each group there are various characters with different skills which are useful during direct confrontation with the enemy. The player's task is to defeat the opponent mafia and take control of the city. Nice graphics, based on the aesthetic of a comic strip make the game even more interesting. There are three different tactics which can lead you to success, but there is only one Kingpin!

name: Lost In The Murk
description: Lost in the Murk is an atmospheric psychological horror experience, exploring the human condition through deep narrative. Explore a top-down environment of pitch darkness, gather materials from a broken world, and craft items to help your journey into the Murk.

name: Land of Zombies
description: World is waiting for you! Save the world from those Zombies. Let's get started...

name: It Consumes
description: Use demonic sonar to reveal the world around you as you fight your way through Lovecraftian horrors in this roguelike arena FPS. Upgrade your abilities, discover hidden secrets, and climb the leaderboards as you plunge deeper and deeper into a world of total darkness.

name: Imaginal Voyages
description: Experience the depths of emotion and the twisted psychology of the flawed human condition. Encounter futuristic technology and the cosmic horrors of space travel. Examine the differences between man and machine.

name: I Had a Plan!
description: You are a Wizard, with a brilliant plan. Unfortunately you also have teammates. As you make your way through dungeons and forests alike, you need to manage your team mates… and your frustration. I Had A Plan! is a Roguelike Semi-Autobattler set in a 3D world with 2D Characters.

name: Mabus 3000
description: Mabus 3000 is an arcade shooter game where you control a single player in battle with increasingly more difficult enemies and levels in the spirit of Space Invaders and Galaga.

name: Turn on the lights! Brain Game
description: Enjoy this new and exciting puzzle game!

name: BeDo
description: Traverse galactic phases and find the Dough scattered throughout space in an addictive adventure of precision and relaxing floating

name: Auto RiskRisk
description: A strategic 2D equipment-based auto battler. Equip your fighters with different items and artefacts to form a team. Then send them off to fight against AI opponents in single player or against other human players online. By combining certain types of items you can increase your strength or counter the opponents' strategies.

name: Amazon Quest
description: Amazon Quest is an educational game that allows the player to control a brave explorer. The goal is to map all the Amazon region, its villages, tribes, plants and animals by playing match 3 levels.

name: 5 Minute Climb
description: 5 minutes to jump to the top. Fall and it's back to the start.

name: Sword Collector
description: This is an exhilarating 3D action RPG featuring huge boss battles.

name: Borderline Homicide
description: This is a mysterious homicide that occurred in the forest of the border area. A forest ranger died under mysterious circumstances during patrol, without obvious external injuries but with suspected trap marks. As the player, you have to uncover the truth behind the murder.

name: Broken Soul
description: Broken soul is a personal hell of a lost person, which makes Alex meet his own demons. Should he lose to his fears or he must struggle and fight off the things his own mind hides?

name: Bullet Heck
description: Deck your friends and opponents in this competitive card based bullet hell amalgamation!

name: Cadence Cuties
description: Rock out with one hand in this stunning rhythm game! Choose from exciting J-pop songs or groove to your own imported beat. Feast your eyes on exquisite girls and animations while the music takes you away.

name: Calling Home
description: Calling Home is an exciting sci-fi simulation resource management game that draws heavily from games in the factory-building and exploration genres, providing a thrilling mix of building your base, researching, factory management, puzzle solving, exploration, and resource gathering.

name: Night Security
description: Night Security is a Japanese psychological horror game about night security.

name: Coral Caper
description: Welcome to Coral Caper, the thrilling shark-scrolling running game! In this game

name: Cracks Where the Light Gets In
description: A story-driven observational puzzler that requires logical deductions from limited perspectives. Peer through tiny gaps to glean clues about a family living in a one-room shack above an alpine valley. Can you piece together what led them there and shine a little hope on their fractured lives?

name: Crimson Moon
description: When the mystery of the red moon is solved, the story takes off ...... A horror RPG in a strange school, where a high school boy tries to save his sister, but an unexpected truth confronts him...

name: Hellcrossing
description: This is you. Imagine that you have not been the best person in the real world and that when you die, do not go to heaven, you're going to hell. But you still have one last chance, you have the option of escape. You must run, jump, dodge and give the best you have to cross the boiler souls.

name: Teeny Dungeon
description: Traverse a teeny, yet infinite dungeon! Fight goblins and grab gold in the smallest rogue-like to ever exist!

name: Mini Golf Worlds
description: Play mini golf across dozens of amazing 3D worlds packed full of physics puzzles and mini putt magic. Take your chance on the high seas, adventure into tombs of lost civilizations, trek across vast deserts or simply keep it real with amazing and fun classic mini golf levels.

name: K2 Story
description: Can you get your team to the top of the worlds most dangerous mountain? This amazing K2 mountain climbing simulation game dares you! Battle the cold, the thin atmosphere, the wind and the snow! Do your best to avoid debilitating medical conditions! React to dramatic and dynamic weather conditions! Stay alive in the death zone! The higher you climb, the more points you will score! But keep your team rested and in good health. There are severe penalties for injuries.

name: Pirate Island
description: In Pirate Island, you play as the legendary pirate captain Blackbeard, who has returned from the dead to reclaim your lost island. The game is a top-down, Soulslike-style action-RPG, where you must navigate dangerous environments, defeat challenging enemies, and upgrade your character to progress.

name: Arcanists 2
description:
Arcanists 2 is a captivating online, turn-based multiplayer strategy fangame where you can create your own character and select a book of spells to bring in to battle with up to 24 people!

This popular game originally hosted on FunOrb by Jagex (creators of RuneScape) has been accurately re-created thanks to developer pur3 extreme.
We are a free to play, non-profit project, serving to bring the game back for the fans of the original. It is important to note that Jagex are the owners of Arcanists and all credit goes to them.

Arcanists 2 has been re-coded from the ground up using Unity as the game engine. Playable on Windows, Mac, Linux and Android!

name: Hammerwatch II
description: Gather your heroes and journey beyond the dungeons of Castle Hammerwatch to explore a pixelated world like never before. Aid King Roland’s resistance while helping villagers along the way. Battle beasts, finish off hordes of the undead, and face the forces of evil in this epic ode to classic ARPG.

name: Books of Grandura
description: Explore a procedurally generated world full of fantasy and danger as a being created by lost magic.

name: Fruit Jammin'
description: Fruit Jammin’ is a narrative driven puzzle-platformer where you take on the role of Fig, a 16-year-old musician bat. Use your unique abilities to convert nearly every sound in the game into light, solve puzzles by doing so, reconnect with your friends, and save the annual fall festival.

name: Santas Basement
description: Join forces with friends to defeat an evil witch and save Christmas in the cooperative game Santa's Basement.

name: Kaiten Sushi VR
description: Kaiten Sushi VR is a game that you can experience basic operations of a conveyor belt sushi restaurant.

name: Anseion
description: Get ready for a journey to the world of Anseion, an immersive 2D MMORPG. Choose your fraction: good or evil. Fight against players and monsters, explore the fascinating world, collect items and create your own. Make a unique character. Participate in events and fraction battles, increase your rank.

name: Haunted Heye Apartment
description: Strange things frequently happen in the apartment, such as the black shadow by the bed, the face behind the curtains, and the eccentric neighbor... This old apartment seems to be hiding some unknown secrets... Will you walk ignorantly into death or discover the truth and escape to safety?

name: Nightshaders
description: In this thrilling co-op twin-stick shooter, play as a group of brave kids who must fight against hordes of creepy monsters. Collect and upgrade an arsenal of unique homemade weapons and abilities to battle through exciting environments and defeat powerful bosses.

name: Atlantis Academy
description: Arcane magic bubbles up from a forgotten city…can you harness the power of the depths? You’ve tamed a feral water dragon and are now eligible to train alongside other magical merfolk at the Academy. A sublime, underwater fantasy RPG!

name: So Much Stuff 2
description: So much more stuff to find in this game!

name: Lotte
description: A minimalistic five-minute puzzle platformer, where you become a fly when you die. Immerse yourself in a relaxing forest and use your ability to become a fly to solve puzzles.

name: Princess of Mekana
description: After the King of Mekana falls ill to a mysterious illness, possibly due to poison, the Princess of Mekana must take regency and successfully claim the throne against various forces acting against her.

name: Infinity Trials
description: Enter the Infinity Trials, an action-packed fast-paced rogue-lite. Fight off waves of dangerous creatures and collect artifacts to enhance your abilities. With each victory, you'll be teleported to a new world, each with unique challenges and enemies.

name: Tenders Fight
description: Tenders Fight is a thrilling fighting game where you go up against a horde of aggressive chicken aliens. You play as a boxer, using your skills to defeat these cunning creatures. With each level, the chickens become stronger and smarter, testing your abilities to their limits. Can you defeat them?

name: Underboard
description: A roguelike autobattler about people appearing in a dangerous place. Build a team of characters, equip them with items and aid them with spells to battle against monsters and meet their fate in the Underboard.

name: Breach in Space
description: Breach in Space is a 2D shooting game with challenging combat and platforming. Find a way back to home galaxy through 4 different planets.

name: Three Kingdoms Origin
description: Three Kingdoms Origin is a multi-player online real-time strategy game based on the Three Kingdoms history which recreates realistic landscapes in the world map. Look out for flank attacks and road blocks from your enemies when you explore the open world and build your city.

name: Lovely Nurse
description: Lovely Nurse is a soothing puzzle game that offers players a chance to unwind while solving puzzles. Complete each puzzle while enjoying beautiful pictures of hot girls.

name: Dwarves Mining Idle
description: Starting with a lonely Dwarf, endlessly mine to gather materials and use them to progress farther. Have more Dwarves join in, craft resources and upgrade literally everything! The mines of the idle Dwarves await you!

name: Erenshor
description: Erenshor is a single player nod to the MMORPGs of the past. Created specifically for the nostalgic gamer who no longer wants to commit to online or scheduled play times, it offers unrestricted exploration, strategic battles, and countless weapons, armors, and spells to discover.

name: Monster Museum
description: Have you ever dreamed of having your own museum where you can collect monsters? Dream no further, because now you can do it in Monster Museum!

name: Minor Scale
description: Minor Scale is a rhythm-based tower defense game with a 2D / 3D hybrid whimsical aesthetic. YOU the player will conduct a band of cute little Critters to defend their jam session from the creepy Crawlies threatening their home with the power of music.

name: Gobyworld
description: An absurd point-and-click adventure, where you help Goby, a piece of swallowed gum, in his quest to find freedom beyond the digestive system.

name: Kook
description: In this fast-paced, retro FPS game with a Quake-like feel, players will battle Lovecraftian monsters in a Victorian-era steampunk world using crazy weapons and navigating mind-bending gravity.

name: Candy Lattice
description: Candy Lattice is a fun and addictive puzzle game that challenges your ability to strategize and think on your feet.

name: Backrooms Project: The Lost File
description: Backrooms Project: The Lost File - it's a horror exploration game, with many puzzles

name: Captain Moviestar 3D
description: An FPS starring your favorite platformer character Captain Moviestar… now in full three-dimensions. Early 90’s 2.5D-raycaster-style shooter for the proto-boomer set.

name: Lightballs
description: Lightballs is local multiplayer, silly footlball game for 2 players. There are 2 mods to play

name: Drift Reign
description: Get ready to reign supreme in the ultimate drifting simulator - Drift Reign! Start as a street drifter, choose your car from USA, Japan, or Germany, and work your way up to the top. With realistic physics and deep customization options, this game will make you feel like a real pro-drifter.

name: Brewess
description: Brewess is a narrative adventure game about crafting ales and building friendships in Early Modern East Anglia. The region is plagued with power struggles that you must navigate as a brewer, using your dry wit and natural charm to keep your business open and your purses full.

name: Getting Freaky With Fujiki
description: In a secluded room of a coworking space, you meet a female student named Fujiki. She talks to you about things in her daily life which you quietly listen to in your room. All while hoping for some peace and quiet. How will your daily life change in your interactions with Fujiki?

name: 911: Cannibal
description: Search items and solve puzzles to escape from the cannibal's plate. Cover up your tracks so that the maniac does not suspect anything.

name: Settlements Rising
description: Settlements Rising is a resource management-focused survival and city-building simulation game set in medieval. While meeting the growing basic and luxury needs of the village through hunting, gathering, farming, and trading, you must also fend off raids on the village using military tactics.

name: Betroyal
description: Betroyal is a fast-paced roguelite turn-based tactical game, in which you play as a king dethroned by his own daughter. Gather an army from scratch, hire different mercenaries with exclusive skills, and level up your commander unlocking new destructive powers to get your throne back!

name: Mystery in the Office
description: An immersive single-player text-based game that takes you to an eerily empty office, mysteriously locked from the outside. Investigate the interactive rooms, face challenges and obstacles to unlock the only available exit, and unravel the mystery of why the office was abandoned in a hurry.

name: Sciware Defense
description: A 3D FPS/TPS Tower Defence game in a sci-fi world, defend your base from corrupted robots and unlock better turrets

name: Disease Z
description: On January 14, 2024, what we thought was the common flu turned into something terrible. It's been 6 years since then. You are the last survivor of Z City. Create, Build, Hunt and try to survive in a post-apocalyptic environment.

name: Space Shark Wrangle Fest
description: Space Shark Wrangle Fest is a fast-paced, top-down 2D action game where you wrangle space sharks! Collect power-ups and combos, and navigate through wormholes that react to the beat of the energetic soundtrack. A fresh take on classic arcade gameplay that's packed with adrenaline and excitement.

name: Zombi Rockstar
description: Zombi Rockstar is a platform game with zombies and rock and roll in which you will travel the city escaping from the holocaust zombie canival.

name: Dash & Swing
description: A fast-paced action platformer, use your acrobatic skills to navigate through challenging levels. Swing and dash through a variety of obstacles to reach the end of each stage. With intuitive controls and thrilling gameplay, Dash & Swing offers an exciting experience for players who love platformers.

name: Yet Another Hentai Puzzle: PTSD
description: Discover the best Hentai Puzzle Visual Novel on Steam! Enjoy stunning art, beautiful ladies, soothing music, and an intriguing story - all to make your evening delightful!

name: Rivals of Aether II
description: Rivals of Aether II is the sequel to the hit indie fighting game, Rivals of Aether. Play as both new and returning elemental fighters in the next generation of platform fighters.

name: Beacon Patrol
description: Beacon Patrol is a cooperative and relaxing tile laying exploration game. You play as captains of the Coast Guard, navigating the coast of the North Sea to secure its beacon buoys, lighthouses and waterways. Work together with your friends and score points by creating the most complete map.

name: Counterclocking
description: A Bayo-May-Cry inspired action game based in a cyberpunk world. Cutting through your way between cyborgs, mutants, and robots while listening to the great soundtracks!

name: Hi Eggplant: The Birth of Sprites
description: This is an original planting experience game. Players can grow high-quality eggplants through reasonable physical distribution, careful observation and accumulated experience. The newly added task system will make you busier than before, but when you are free, go chat with the sprites!

name: Stelarace
description: Welcome to Stellarace, the ultimate space roller skating game where players can choose from four different avatars to race through the galaxy, competing against each other to be the fastest skater in the universe!

name: Secret Blade
description: Take command of the mystical forge of Hephaestus and craft the most legendary weapons in the war against evil. Travel the world facing challenges in singleplayer or co-op. Combine materials and master crafting steps while protecting your forge from enemies and fighting against time!

name: Strato Supremacy
description: Strato Supremacy is a flight combat simulation game where players defeat enemies and destroy cities with different planes and weapons while navigating through randomly generated terrains.

name: Death, Soul & Robots
description: In this captivating Metroidvania game you will take on the role of a cute kitty cat on its mission to find the soul of Planet 42 to rescue the Earth. Fight enemies and bosses, solve puzzles and explore levels in this fascinating game.

name: Tycoon Legends
description: Will you rise to the top and become a Tycoon Legend?

name: Sensual Adventures: Episode 7
description: EP7 takes place 4 years before the start of EP1, a time when the girls had only just met and were starting their adventures and tumultuous relationship together. As Futanari, the girls are always ready to fuck and have a habit of finding their way into bed with anyone and everyone… even the enemy.

name: Phrixothrix
description: Explore a dark world of rust and worms. Phrixothrix is an adventure game with point and click elements, where you control yourself and an alien worm.

name: Panic
description: Panic is a single-player, horror game that puts you in the shoes of David, a young man who struggles with mental disorders. As you join him on his journey you will discover an immersive narrative experience that will stay with you long after you finish your journey.

name: Timberquest
description: Embark on an adventure in our RPG game! Explore a new, wild continent and fight to survive against environmental factors and monsters. With a heavy focus on cooperative play. Customize your character's stat-driven abilities to suit your preferred playstyle.

name: Six Ages 2: Lights Going Out
description: Life after myths. Death, disaster, despair. A standalone survival-storybook combining interactive fiction and turn-based strategy. The world is ending, and your small clan's survival depends on how you manage its relationship with the remaining gods and their followers.

name: Hong Kong Obscure
description: Experience the trippy and mysterious world of "Hong Kong Obscure". Armed with a magic flashlight, frisbee, and projectile gun, uncover hidden secrets and hunt down invisible spies in the gritty slums of Hong Kong.

name: The Final Exhibition
description: Explore an ever-changing maze as you hunt for photos of important objects and avoid whatever could be stalking you throughout the halls.

name: Knowledge Fever
description: Knowledge Fever is a quiz game where you are a guy wanting to learn more about everything in the biggest library in the world! But this library holds some nasty secrets only those inside know. . . are you ready to enter there?

name: Unhinged 2
description: You wake up and find yourself in the midst of a psychotic infestation, and gotta find a way out and avoid being chewed up into a red paste...

name: AI Unbound
description: AI Unbound is a captivating, atmospheric puzzle-adventure game where you dive into a unique experience crafted by an AI, complete engaging puzzles, and unveil the story behind your enigmatic journey in this thought-provoking world. Note: this description was written by an AI.

name: Lasting Moonlight
description: Lasting moonlight is a walking simulator focused on story and unique minigames. As the narrator is faced with the consequences of his own actions, he reaces out to you, the player, to help him repair what is left. Learn the truth while exploring beautifull locations and game mechanics.

name: Savant: Ascent - Anniversary Edition
description: Ascend to greater heights in this fully remastered edition of Savant - Ascent! Includes brand new content, stages, bosses, and an entire original soundtrack by music artist Savant.

name: Outside the Blocks
description: Unleash your creativity and design your own diorama in Outside the Blocks ‒ a full-featured model builder. Shape the terrain, assemble modular houses, add decorations and put your creation on display!

name: Fujiwara Phoenix
description: In this metroidvania Touhou fan game, burn a path through Gensokyo as Fujiwara no Mokou with a powerful array of unlockable abilities, but exercise caution as they will burn you right back. Merciless aggression is the key; with defeating enemies as the only way to restore precious hp.

name: Backrooms Society
description: Backrooms Society is a 1-8 player co-op horror game. Make your way through unique levels of the backrooms while trying to survive and avoid mysterious entities. Scavenge each level for gear and resources, bring it back to The Hub where you can sell valuables and buy/craft new gear.

name: Zero Lilium Bloom
description: Explore cycles of growth and transformation in a vibrant world full of life and surprises. With relaxing cultivation simulation, action-packed exploration, stunning graphics, immersive sound, and intuitive gameplay.

name: Quecksilber
description: A fast-paced futuristic sports game, with accurate ball physics, retro and fun gameplay, heavily inspired by classics like Kick Off, NHL and Speedball.

name: StarGazers
description: A shape-shifting, interactive nature experience. Transform into animals and explore the world around you.

name: Graveyard Sprint
description: Graveyard Sprint is a 3D parkour game that combines gothic style with exciting gameplay

name: Assault Sector
description: Welcome to a brutal and unforgiving PvP Arena Shooter. With a unique pulse wallhack ability, camping is impossible. Pure adrenaline, all the time. A throwback to a "golden-era" of classic FPS Games. Do you have what it takes? Let's see. Jump in.

name: Gunfield
description: Gunfield - A game that combines genres: shoot 'em up, roguelite and bullet heaven. Destroy hordes of alien ships and giant bosses, unlock and upgrade new weapons and abilities.

name: Game Dev Fantasy
description: Join the adventure of game development while sailing the seas with your indie studio! Use your wits and strategy to complete development tasks, learn new skills, and launch your game before the deadline. With the sea breeze on your face, you're all set to create an amazing game!

name: Find the Way Out Samurai!
description: Find the Way Out Samurai! is an indie-action game where you play as a skilled samurai who has been tasked with taking down the big boss who is causing chaos and destruction throughout the land.

name: Ａ Class
description: A romantic, adventure RPG.

name: Pigeon Protocol
description: Play with up to 30 of your friends in this frantic bird based online game! Customize your pigeon, Compete to build nests, own territory and to keep hold of shiny things. But watch out, its a bird eat bird world out there!

name: Mechanical Gods
description: Mechanical Gods is a 3D Arena Fighting game. Choose your favourite fighter and test your skills against powerful AIs and players alike, hitting, slashing, dashing and kicking your way through every arena. Each fight you survive gets you closer to unveil the secrets of the Mechanical Gods.

name: Edentopia
description: Explore a magical open world in our adventure crafting game. Craft spells, collect rare items, and fight bosses to expand your base. With endless customization and exploration, every playthrough is unique. Embrace the power of magic and survive in this treacherous world.

name: Grade Sword
description: Grade Sword is a turn-based strategy rogue like game in which a soldier with a changing weapon takes the king to the castle by removing obstacles. Get the possibility of new weapons with mini-games, events, and money, and beat the probability to safely take the king to the castle.

name: Evotales
description: Evotales is a puzzle-platformer about our gilled ancestor who decided to lead the rise of mankind

name: Doki Simp Club
description: After simping too hard for streaming waifus, Ren uncovers a corrupt billionaire's plan to weaken men and take down society. Adventure alongside a secret task force while you simp for anime girls (without your actual money) to save the world.

name: V.O.I.D.: Vexation of Infinite Dungeons
description: Unleash your medieval might in our co-op dungeon crawler! Pick from 5 classes, confront dark fantasy monsters, loot, and watch out for backstabbing allies. Procedurally generated worlds - every playthrough is unique. Conquer the dungeon and win!

name: My Best Friend Kouta
description: In this slice of life game focused heavily on Netorare, Eisen introduces Evie, his delicate and gentle girlfriend, to his perverted best friend Kouta. As Kouta slowly burns Evie's mind, you in the role of Eisen can explore the city and uncover what's happening.

name: Gain Foxes
description: This game is a business simulation where you aim to achieve a target amount of money along with the merchant Finne. The business strategies are deployed by each player by combining five choices.

name: Core Lords
description: A lone quarry worker has life and the elements come crashing down... Go on an adventure in a strange world wielding powerful geomancer-like abilities against the environment, solving puzzles and fighting odd creatures in turn-based battles in CORE LORDS.

name: Mercenaries of the Kingdom
description: Party-based rogue-lite RPG set in Earthial, a fantasy world. Hire various races of mercenaries, equip them, create battle formations, and grab the loot! You are a mercenary hired to save the world from a mysterious threat from the North. Good luck, my friend!

name: Pixel Driver
description: Fast paced infinite driving in heavy traffic.

name: Gadget Tycoon
description: Gadget Tycoon allows you to step into the shoes of an inventor and embark on a journey to become famous and take on the world with your inventions. Gadget Tycoon is a well-executed game that is fun, intricate, and goes beyond a standard tycoon game by including adventure and story portions

name: Sunrise GP
description: Sunrise GP takes you on a nostalgic journey with its retro-styled cars, racing through breathtaking locations. Personalize the look of your beloved car, immerse yourself in a soothing soundtrack, and continuously improve your racing times - everything is designed to help you relax and soak up the laid-back atmosphere.

name: Japanese Nekosama Games: The Outlaws
description:
Get back the stolen canned cat food
And Save cats' food crisis!

name: Racing in Car
description: Racing in Car offers the soul of motor racing in the most beautiful,authentic and advanced racing game.

name: Drone Master Racing
description: This drone simulator is an exciting experience for up to 5 players to play, perfect for fans of racing and competition.

name: Summer Bubble Splash
description: Solve fun matching puzzles underwater and use different boosters to splash to the next level!

name: Aphotic Descent
description: In Aphotic Descent, you play as a diver whose submarine crashed at the bottom of the ocean. With no other option for survival, you must make your way to a nearby underwater research facility facing terrifying creatures, all while descending deeper and deeper...

name: I'll Kill Her
description: Visual novel in the form of interactive comic book about love, life and fighting to be heard.

name: Lost to Riches
description: Fight your way through an army of demons in order to escape a cursed casino, using a variety of powerful items, weapons and holier than thou upgrades in this Rogue-Lite experience!

name: Be Frugal
description: Be Frugal is a bus stop design simulation for a growing city. Draw lines between stops and run buses. As new stops open, redraw your lines to keep them active. Decide carefully where you will use your limited resources.

name: Ocean Cat
description: Ocean Cat is a very fun fishing game. The main character of the game is a cute little cat wearing a diving suit,

name: G.O.M.P!
description: G.O.M.P! is an action-packed game where you defend your farm from invaders. Compete with friends and survive wave after wave of enemies. Yeehaw!

name: Die Rave
description: Rave is a grim dark fantasy puzzle game where you play as a lost soul trying to find salvation from eternal suffering in the endless corridors of hell. You'll need to solve challenging puzzles and fight off enemies to progress through the game's immersive storyline.

name: All Quiet in the Trenches
description: All Quiet in the Trenches is a narrative turn-based strategy game set in the Great War. Get to know your soldiers, take care of their needs and lead them in battle, trying to strike a precarious balance between the ambitions of your superiors and the survival of your men.

name: Outlaw Kingdom
description: A Strategy, Auto Battle, Roguelite Game. Take control of your outlaws, rob, steal and fight your way to riches. Build up your camp and recruit more outlaws so you can take over the Kingdom.

name: A.S.S.: Awesome Street Skaters
description: Awesome Street Skaters is a gritty skateboarding action-management game. Grab your skateboard and challenge your neighborhood skaters. Travel the world and compete against the best. Prove yourself and rise up to the World Championship.

name: Grimm of the Dome
description: In this last city of mankind, an isolated paradise in the ocean, your choices and dices will lead it to Utopia or Distopia. You will help the magistrate AI to investigate the AI-worship religious group, illicit drugs, those who were resurrected, and those who are neither android nor mankind…

name: Omnigon
description: A humourous mini-metroidvania where you have the power to shapeshift other objects

name: Mystillion
description: Once. A certain village was destroyed by the hands of the devil. "Red Village Tragedy - " The only girl who survived the incident called that - Isla. Even though she was tormented by the memories of her past, she lived each day to the fullest.

name: Pirate Plight
description: It's pirates against British sailors (or each other) in this real-time strategy city-building game. Gather resources, build cities, drink rum, fight enemies, explore the sea, and discover new islands.

name: Shinehill
description: Yet again they dumped the toughest job on you. Now you are on a Shinehill Island, where you suddenly replaced one of the new residents. Explore the world, meet charming townspeople, do farming, fishing, cooking and try not to reveal yourself.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S: Shikaku
description:
Divide the grid into rectangles
in this remarkably satisfying puzzle.

name: Parkour Jump Adventure
description: Enter in this wonderful game world of jump and parkour. Your only competitor in this game is you, because you you have to surpass yourself every time with the highest possible results!

name: Child Run: City Surfers Runner
description: Become a professional runner by passing all the barriers and obstacles. Explore new cities and take all coins!

name: IGS Classic Arcade Collection
description:
IGS classic arcade game is transplanted for the first time!
Integrate 8 IGS popular arcade games into one piece.
Support up to 4 people online combat!

The last scenery you faced was a quite unfamiliar hotel office. Leaving all the uncertainties behind, you have to perform significant or insignificant tasks from here on out. -256 is a pixel graphics first-person mystery hotel walking simulator.

name: Dark Desire Mute 4
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life's of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: Tears Fall Low
description: Unravel the mystery of a fallen tear on its journey back to the surface!

name: Marsel: The Alien Clown
description: Explore the magical world of Circus with Marsel in this wonderful 2D platform game inspired by classic platformer games of the 90's. When Marsel's spaceship crashes on Earth, he discovers that the parts needed for repairs can only be found on Circuses of yesterday, today, and tomorrow!

name: Lofi Milk Delivery
description: Welcome to the world of milk delivery, where hot girls bring you fresh milk every day. These hard working girls are willing to do anything to get extra tips.

name: ExTime: Primal Menace
description: ExTime: Primal Menace is an action-adventure horror game inspired by iconic franchises such as Dino Crisis and Resident Evil. Travel to the archipelago in the Bermuda Triangle and find out what brought the monsters of the Cretaceous period back to our world.

name: Warbits+
description: Warbits+ is a charming turn-based strategy game where victory is achieved through tactics and determination. Compete with your friends locally and online, hone your skills with single-player missions, or battle for glory against other commanders on the community hub.

name: Corr
description: Corr is a difficult Souls-lite Boss Rush Action RPG where you Run-n-Gun & Hack-n-Slash your way through challenging boss encounters. To endure the strange, dark and whacky world of Corr, level up and customize your warrior build with berserk powers, tonics, talismans and more.

name: Escalar
description: Escalar is an adventure precision platformer, with collectathon and puzzle elements. Climb a mysterious tower to reach the rumoured treasures that lie within!

name: The Bread Must Rise
description: The Great Godstone Bake-off has arrived! As a hapless baker deeply in debt, you finally have the opportunity to rise to fame and fortune! Under the tutelage of famous chefs , you will learn the arts of baking, breading, and dare you whisper it...necromancy?

name: Hyper Hentai Elf Attendant
description: Hyper Hentai Elf Attendant is a relaxing puzzle game. With the theme of elf attendant and multiple unique sexy girls. Enjoy sexy girls pictures and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Digits
description: A daily numbers puzzle from The New York Times.

name: Taima Toushin Hachikuma Tok
description: Taima Toushin Hachikuma ToK is a role-playing game for Windows, released on 2004. The game has various versions or names, we can play the final version from dlsite. It includes parodies of several games and animes.

name: Skinner & The Superintendent
description: Help Skinner to do an unforgettable luncheon for Chalmers, with 9 possible endings!

name: Mountaincore
description: Settle an untamed wilderness with the might of Dwarven engineering and thoughtful planning! Design and build your colony towards fame and fortune in a deeply-simulated fantasy world. Chill out in peaceful mode with a bustling settlement, or fight for survival against monsters and invasions!

name: NTRstory
description: NTRStory is a casual simulation game where you, the player will plan your step to lead Wifuko to the journey of lust and happiness. Choose your path of either Netorare, Netori, or Netorase, this is your story...

name: Immortals of Aveum: Deluxe Edition
description: Summon your power, stop the Everwar, save the realms.

name: Slingshot Trip
description: In Slingshot Trip, you must use different types of ammunition to survive successive waves of enemies for as long as possible. Avoid attacks, use traps and shields, plan your attacks, and achieve better results to beat other players' records and become the champion of the game!

name: Cyber Tamer
description: Evolve your mech-enabled Cybermon, investigate the mystery behind your family's death, and craft the strategy of time to become the world's best Cybermon trainer!

name: 5 Star Fishy
description: Explore, bite, talk, and swim to the bottom of this semi-linear aquatic metriodvania! The world isn't particularly happy with a tiny pink fishy trying to nuke them, and they may try to kill you, so stay sharp and don't bite off more than you can chew.

name: Omnipresence
description: Play as a Computer Virus that can take control of any robot, your mission is to destroy them all!

name: Neon Magic: Witch Shop
description: Become the owner of a store selling all sorts of magical knick-knacks and earn money by selling potions, staffs, magical weapons, and other junk. Improve your shop-tower and hire assistants.

name: Axolotl Kingdom
description: Axolotl Kingdom is a charming hand drawn pet simulator, where you can adopt your own Axolotl. You can customise your Axolotl with 40 unique accessories, with options for all styles! Our Kingdom is brimming with life, with locations such as the Cafe and Arcade. There’s so much to explore and enjoy!

name: Dungeon of Argion
description: Fight the underground creatures of Argion to free the land from a curse. You have to fight your way through several dungeons full of dangerous creatures and bosses. Try to utilise, level up and combine many different weapons and passive items to stand a chance of defeating them all.

name: Outway
description: Outway is a 3d platform collectathon, metroidvania. Staring a spherical robot that looks like a football, you roll, monkey ball style, utilizing your bodies physics to get to new areas and explore a mysterious future world populated by machines.

name: Riddle of the Jelly
description: The adventure… the glory… the mystery… Can you solve the Riddle of the Jelly?

name: The Forgotten Tapes: Twisted Forms
description: The second collection in the widely received "Forgotten Tapes" series, where we explore the theme of "Body Horror" with 8 unique games from different developers. Explore a morgue after hours & experiment on 8 poor souls who have lost their way. Can you make it through the night?

name: Resourcer
description: Dig deep into diverse biomes, uncover ancient treasures and mine various resources. Craft new tools and build various production structures. Improve your character’s skills and unlock new features as you progress through the game. Manage the resources and create an efficient production chain.

name: Hag
description: In Hag, players must explore and interact with an innocuous home environment in first person, solving intricate puzzles and an unknown mystery whilst escaping the clutches of a sadistic hag and her morbid son.

name: Obscurite Magie: The Blood of Kings
description: Lietta Fane, a swordswoman and adventurer, is on a mission to find the killer of her swordmaster who raised her like a father.

name: Melancholy Date
description: Have you ever felt like you were drowning in sadness, and the only way to stay afloat was to hold onto someone else's hand? Melancholy Date is the story of my journey through depression, and the search for love amidst the melancholy.

name: Crying Pony
description: Crying Pony is a 2D side-scrolling horror game where the protagonist, Michael, is hunted by the lurking evil in his nightmares. As the nightmare's corruption seeps into reality and even pulls Michael's daughter into its grasp, will he be able to lead them both to escape from the nightmare?

name: Steel Rampart
description: Steel Rampart (Steel Rampart) is a 2D game in which players need to control machine guns to defend themselves against incoming enemies, including planes and tanks.

name: Caveman Ransom
