description: A fun 16-bit style platformer where you play a caveman fighting against bandits and dinosaurs. It is perfect for carefree gaming and a must for kids as well as for those who want to experience that 1990s nostalgia!

name: Curse of the Corsair
description: Echoes of a swashbuckling and treacherous past reverberate through a vast and untamed sea, brimming with riches and danger. In this action-packed adventure RPG, you'll set sail on a journey inspired by the modern classic Hyper Light Drifter, but with a salty, scurvy twist.

name: Bird's Eye Odyssey
description: Take to the skies and explore a lush world in Bird's Eye Odyssey, a captivating 3D adventure game. Play as a bird protagonist on a quest to uncover the truth about his banishment, and complete tasks like collecting rings, driving a tank, and discovering hidden objects.

name: Archesis
description: Save the kingdom of Archesis in this unique 2D metroidvania game where you can freeze time! Traverse a vast kingdom packed with exciting encounters, unlock new abilities, and overcome its various obstacles! Skillfully harness the power of time, as time only moves when you move.

name: Seaport Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Amulet of Lovar
description: Amulet of Lovar is an oldschool roguelike inspired by Nethack. Delve deep into the Dungeon of Iovar, steal the amulet of the divine and ascend to godhood!

name: Conundrum Catacombs
description: "Light up your path to victory in this thrilling 2D top-down puzzle game. With only a torch to guide you, navigate through challenging levels and solve mind-bending puzzles. Will you keep your flame burning or succumb to the darkness?"

name: Worms W.M.D Mobilize
description:
The worms are back in their most destructive game yet. With a gorgeous, hand-drawn 2D look, brand new weapons, vehicles and buildings plus the return of some much-loved classic weapons and gameplay, Worms W.M.D: Mobilize is the best worms experience ever.

Work your way through 10 training and 20 campaign missions of increasing difficulty using the huge arsenal of new and classic weapons at your disposal. Use new vehicles to cause chaos amongst the enemy ranks and use buildings to gain the tactical advantage as you try to dominate the battlefield!

Take on opponents in hilarious all-out tactical worm warfare either in local or online multiplayer. Flatten your opponents with the Concrete Donkey. Turn them into chunks of worm meat with the Holy Hand Grenade. Rain down hell from above in helicopters or pound them into oblivion with the tank. With 50 weapons and utilities at your fingertips, this is Worms at its chaotic best!

name: Atari Flashback
description: The Atari Flashback is a dedicated console that resembles the Atari 7800 and uses similar controls. The system has 15 Atari 2600 and 5 Atari 7800 games built in.

name: Atari Flashback 2
description:
The Atari Flashback 2 is the successor to the Atari Flashback and includes 40 Atari 2600 games including homebrews and unreleased prototypes.

It also contains two hidden games: Warlords and Super Breakout.

name: Arcade Legends: Space Invaders
description:
Arcade Legends: Space Invaders is a dedicated console that contains five ports of Taito arcade games:

Space Invaders
Phoenix
Lunar Rescue
Qix
Colony 7

name: Droid Invasion
description: Sin descripción

name: Coruscant Attack
description: Sin descripción

name: Grievous Onslaught
description: Sin descripción

name: Gunship Battle
description: Sin descripción

name: Utapau Chase
description: Sin descripción

name: Webosaurs
description: Webosaurs is a former MMORPG, which involved a virtual world containing online games and activities, developed by American studio Reel FX Entertainment. Players could use cartoon dinosaur-avatars and play in a landscape-set world, with a variety of different themes.

name: WordyBuilder
description: WordyBuilder is a word guessing game in German. Reassemble the given letters to form words that are valid under official scrabble rules. You play it via Twitch Chat.

name: Space Lines: Ultimate Edition
description:
A classical Arcade Game for Everyone.
Even More Levels.

Family friendly puzzle game for 1 to 4 players! Play alone or with friends! Conquer more than 100 stages! Battle with various creatures, traps and enjoy your space adventure.

More than 30 ships to unlock! 100 stages! Playable alone or up to 4 players!

name: Conflux
description: Immerse yourself in a unique fantasy world as you explore and interact with a wide variety of colourful characters. Engage in strategic turn-based battles alongside your trusted allies. Uncover the story as it unfurls across the diverse realms of this spellbinding role-playing game.

name: Space Captain McCallery Episode 4: The Turquoise Temple
description: Space Pirate Captain McCallery travels to a mysterious planet of Turquoise to uncover the secrets of the Turquoise Temple

name: Psychiatric Hospital
description: When your madness is not desired, When your madness that you did not want is strangled by the bars in the pit. You go from being a powerless goat to a human being, and the only way to surprise the white coats who want to cure you completely is to take refuge in the craziness you want.

name: Dye the Bunny
description: Dye the Bunny is an Easter horror game about little Ellie going on an Easter Egg Hunt down a rabbit hole.

name: Planetary Factory
description: Grow your planetary empire from a small base to a massive production powerhouse in Planetary Factory. Balance inputs and outputs to maximize profits and minimize waste, research advanced technologies, and build a formidable military to conquer hostile planets.

name: Bendo
description: Bendo is an action/third person shooter game that takes place in France, and that offers you a full open map to explore, gangsters to fight, drug lords to beat, and much more.

name: Combo Bombo
description: Combo Bombo is an online multiplayer game where friends can engage in joyful combat using various creative and powerful weapon combinations. Players are challenged to think strategically as they combine different weapons to form even more devastating tools of destruction.

name: Battery Samurai
description: Get batteries to get stronger! Enjoy your adventure now! Recover lost parts and get various skills.

name: Roads of Rome: Portals 2 - Collector's Edition
description: Another adventure of Romans who lost in the mysterious portals while searching the way home.

name: Fotress S
description: Sin descripción

name: Backgammon Pro for Nintendo Switch
description:
Utilizing AI machine learning and game record analysis, this is as authentic as Backgammon gets!
It even supports online multiplayer!

name: Castle of the Underdogs
description: Find a castle, recruit friends and try to restore the peace in the Bestann Federation while spreading chaos to most places you step on in this comedy JRPG.

name: Arcade Classics
description: Collection of a few arcade classics, remade with a fresh and friendly looking art style and a beautiful soundtrack.

name: Industrix
description: Step into the world of industrial production and become a master in factory-building! Create efficient production lines and manage your resources. As you progress through the game, you'll need to complete challenges for a certain company in order to rank up and unlock new technologies!

name: Luminite Era: Expedition
description: "Luminite Era: Expedition" is a 2D pixel-style side-scrolling action game. Players will use different weapons and unique spell mechanisms to defeat monsters from the "Black Fog" and explore the truth of the world.

name: Electrician Simulator: Smart Devices
description: Electrician Simulator goes Smart! Complete new "wireless" missions and take your service to the next level. Fix plenty of new smart devices that needs repair and satisfy your clients!

name: Ortheo's Interdimensional Jam Session
description: Get lost in the musical madness of Ortheo's Interdimensional Jam Session. Groove to unique beats, create custom levels with drag & drop or play-through charting, and share your creations with Steam Workshop support. Experience trippy visuals, challenging gameplay, and endless fun.

name: Dominus Solaris
description: In the year 2073, the Skolovan Empire attacked and subdued planet Earth. The rebels gathered technology from whatever they could to build a prototype ship, the Dominus Solaris. Now it's up to you, the ship's sole pilot, to fight and liberate the Earth from the usurpers.

name: Second Dreamer
description: Rent games, pick out a movie for movie night, buy fireworks, explore the town and neighborhood, the world is yours but this particular night holds many secrets.

name: Hentai Ami
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Alpha Sorcerer
description: An elite sorcerer king with forgotten magical powers mysteriously reappears in a bloody quest for revenge in the supreme action platformer.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening
description: The Fief system allows you to capture land and give it to your subordinates to manage. Divvy up and parcel out the beautifully detailed Sengoku Japan as you like, and make it prosper

name: Story in the Dream World 3: Sinister Island's Mysterious Mist
description: This Game is 'Story in the dream World Series' 3rd story -Sinister Island's Mysterious Mist-! It is a Game in which the main characters are active with help in order to stop the fog in an island, the source of it, after hearing signs or stories of unknown poison fog coming from various gods before!

name: Garage Sale
description: It's garage sale day! Embark on a small scavenger hunt throughout Lettuce Village's community-wide garage sale. In this story exploration game, you'll collect items with strange backstories, help your quirky neighbors, and maybe even uncover some of the town's secrets... Coming soon!

name: Pigeon Strike
description: This cute casual game is offering you the chance to relax and get some lazy revenge while you test your reflexes and expand your poop reign.

name: Speed Golf Royale
description: A golf game where speed matters!

name: Jane’s Hotel: New story - Collector’s Edition
description: The long-awaited reboot of Jane’s Hotel is here. Jane is ready to start new hotels. Start with a small hotel and go further. Three fully upgradable hotels are awaiting.

name: The Game of Annie
description: This is a third person action shooter game. Support for custom character size, support for costume change, use guns and bows for long-distance combat, can also use cold weapons for melee combat, with some training elements. Enemies include monsters and humans.

name: Reborn a Zombie!
description: A queer, slice-of-life visual novel about the hardships and joys of a trans girl transformed into a zombie. Follow her new life in a world filled with magic, cute demons and dragons!

name: Ninja Party
description: Ninja Party is a 2-4 player local multiplayer game! Play as one of four ninjas in disguise, and blend in with the townfolk. Identify your friends and take them out or enlist the help of an aggressive yet adorable dog to do the dirty work for you.

name: Aurendor
description: Aurendor is an open world survival game. Players must gather resources, cook their meals and fight dangerous creatures to survive and build a home for themselves. Aurendor also offers a multiplayer game option. Players can play together by cooperating with or battling other survivors.

name: Socket Fighters
description: Domestic appliances battle it out in this 2D fighting game. Fight in familiar household settings using everyday items as weapons. Enjoy unique character animations and special attacks for an action-packed experience!

name: Malice
description: Malice: Burn haunted objects, banish demons in a spooky mansion. Multiplayer or single-player options. Are you brave enough to survive?

name: Desolation
description: Desolation will bring a complete Looter-Shooter experience to Mobile Devices with fresh controls, a focus on teamplay and a lot of build customization with near endless potential for maximizing your efficiency.

name: Fallen
description: Be the light that shines on the world by climbing to the top. The way up is never easy. Can you avoid all obstacles and climb to the top?

name: Neko Office: Nightlife Adventures
description: Neko has been working hard at her job in the office and deserves to go to the bar! As you know, it is from the bar that nightly adventures begin...

name: Doggo Garden Defense
description: Critters are on their way to eat your carrots! Recruit fearsome Doggos to shoo them away in this casual yet strategic Tower Defense game. Defend your garden across a variety of different levels, each with four difficulty modes. Can you save your crops, or will the Critters win?

name: Akari and the Abyss
description: This game is a JRPG featuring a girl exploring the demon-infested Hell Palace. During her journey, the demon-slaying girl, Akari, encounters incidents where people's souls have been stolen. In order to save everyone, Akari challenges the Hell Palace and the story begins.

name: Death Raid
description: "Death Raid" is a primal action-packed hack-and-slash game, where you'll face a powerful zombie horde. Enjoy pure gameplay with no complex equipment systems, allowing you to focus on gameplay and feel. Only the bravest can survive this dangerous and challenging world. Are you ready?

name: Hentai Casual Swap 2
description: Enjoy our newest and sexiest casual tile swap puzzle with dozens of nice illustrations for you to enjoy and relax. With a gallery for simply relaxing! Unlock all the pictures!

name: Escape from Norwood
description: Explore a city that lives without your input in this illustrated text adventure. Observe the lives of its inhabitants behind the veil of your invisibility magic. Find items and combine them to solve intricate puzzles. Set your own pace as you control time and move freely in an open fantasy world.

name: Cactus Venture
description: A platformer about the adventure of a cactus: where it goes and where it ends remains to be seen. You have to play as a cute cactus on a classic platform game. An adventure and arcade game. Also in the game are saws, thorns, doors, and elevators.

name: Factoryopolis
description: Build and run a car factory to design, produce and sell high-quality cars, while expanding your business. Manage resources, research new technologies, and meet market demand. As the factory grows, you can hire more employees and unlock new features.

name: Words of Yendor
description: A word puzzle roguelike set in a steamgoth world of amalgamated steam-age technology and antediluvian sorcery. Collect resources, solve dangerous situations and prepare for a showdown with each Master Villain to discover the meaning behind the Word of Yendor!

name: Momo no Hana ha Senketsu ni Somaru
description: A Japanese visual novel about the adventures of Onmyoji girls.

name: Soliloquy
description: In a vast desert, a lost young man's voice interrupts its silence. While he tries to survive, reality and fiction blur, questioning the perception of existence, freedom and control.

name: Ride 5: Special Edition
description: Enjoy RIDE to the fullest with RIDE 5 - Special Edition! In addition to the full game you'll also get the Season Pass that will give you access to bikes, amazing tracks and a credit multiplier as soon as they become available.

name: Fantasy Love
description: Fantasy Love - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Varial
description: Varial is a single player skateboarding-action game where you play as the titular character fighting a giant robot called the "Y.2.K.A.I.J.U.". The game takes place in a Y2K apocalypse, where all the technology has revolted against humanity and wiped out most of the population.

name: Fragments of the Afterlife
description: As a horror-based RPG, Fragments utilizes a dynamic camera system as well as breathtaking stylized graphics to enhance the fast-paced combat to the in-depth lore. Traverse four unique domains defeating the lost to grow stronger, learn skills and save the afterlife.

name: Sukebe Fantasy
description: Break all the blocks and collect the images.

name: Out of Action
description: Action heavy, multiplayer + singleplayer FPS set in a brutal cyberpunk universe.

name: Cats Hidden Around the World
description: Find 1500 cats hiding in over 15 iconic locations such as Rio de Janeiro, Istanbul or Tokyo in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Bullet Bunny
description: Bullet Bunny is a twin-stick shooter with rogue-like elements. Fend off an onslaught of enemies, level up, and create unique builds every run while trying to survive 500 seconds!

name: Frog Island
description: Frog Island is a fully hand-drawn, cozy Frog Collection and Life-Sim game. Take care of adorable frogs, grow crops, cook meals, place toys and decorations, and uncover the secrets of Frog island!

name: Bullet Brawl
description: Endless action!

name: Rhythm Lust Girl
description: Rhythm Lust Girl is a casual puzzle game. There are 12 beautiful girls with different characteristics in the game. Enjoy the time of jigsaw puzzle with them.

name: Emergency Parking Only
description: A physics-based parking pileup for up to four players. Smash other players' cars out of the way while placing your own cars perfectly - all without any brakes. A delightfully silly party game that'll have you rolling!

name: Forklift Extreme: Furniture Direct
description: Play 10 brand new levels and get special operator skin. Unique environment and challenges awaits!

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Vocaloid Pack 6
description: Sin descripción

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Original Pack 5 (10th Anniversary 2)
description: Sin descripción

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Hit Song + VTuber Pack 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Shardpunk: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cube Heroes
description: A Magic Cube Roguelike: shuffle to match monsters and abilities, traverse a randomly generated path and fight powerful enemies. Choose the right path to victory. Collect rare items to acquire powerful synergies. Can you survive this dangerous journey?

name: Oceanfall
description: Oceanfall is an atmospheric 3D adventure that takes place on a distant planet that has collapsed due to oceanic flooding. Take control of WR-7, a young girl that is tasked with descending the watery depths, while uncovering the dark mysteries that exist both above and below the ocean surface.

description: Do you like tanks game? Are you ready to feel the full power of a tank games?

name: My Hero: After the Fall
description: This is a pixel tower defense game that combines light Rogue and grass cutting! Dozens of heroes for you to choose from, hundreds of blessings appear randomly, with the strongest team components to protect the crystal from monsters!

description: A game about the downsized game industry practitioners, return to the hometown farm and realize the indie game dream.

name: Final Frontier
description: In a ruthless post-apocalyptic world, every day counts. Choose carefully where to hide to avoid the dangers of the hostile environment and deadly enemies. Overcome every challenge to survive one more day. Are you ready to take on the challenge and stay alive?

name: Shattered
description: A shattering revival of '90s fighting games set in a sci-fi/fantasy world inspired by European comics.

name: Blood Strike
description: Blood Strike is a free FPS game which has more than 300 million faithful players in China. Now the battle is on, there are various modes and weapons for you to explore! Call your friends and join us,get into the battle field now!

name: Them's Fightin' Herds: Stronghoof
description: The 9th character to join the TFH roster is Stronghoof the Reindeer. Conjure an arsenal of icy, magical weaponry and fight alongside his muscly winter sprite Vetr!

name: Ungate
description: The action is about a young man named Jason, who follows the steps of his friends to find them and to get them out of a mysterious cave that has its own ecosystem and is known by the locals of the West Village as the gate of hell...

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - Twilight Zone
description: You just crossed over... into the Twilight Zone. With a pinball that isn't, and flippers that aren't, keep telling yourself it's only a game. Earn highscores that are from another dimension with this classic joining the Pinball FX library.

name: Pinball FX: Godzilla vs. Kong Pinball Pack
description: Godzilla and Kong unleash their powers in this epic pinball pack. Play 3 monstrous tables and be the king of the leaderboards.

name: Pinball FX: Marvel Pinball Collection 2
description: Pinball FX and the Marvel Universe collide in Marvel Pinball Collection 2, bringing together a host of tables inspired by Marvel's exciting cadre of Heroes & Villains in one low priced bundle!

name: Pinball FX: Crypt of the NecroDancer Pinball
description: Challenge your skills in this pinball and rhythm fusion table, which captures the wacky atmosphere and killer soundtrack of the acclaimed rogue-like. Stop the NecroDancer once more as you use your flippers to battle bosses and acquire the Golden Lute.

name: Meta Nemesis
description: Meta Nemesis is a competitive fantasy tactical shooter with blockchain technology, making it a unique first-person shooter. Customize your core set of abilities to play exactly how you want to, as you battle fierce enemies and other players in exciting 5v5 matches. Immerse yourse

name: Corpse Party 2: Dead Patient Neues;
description: Corpse Party 2: Dead Patient Neues; is a survival horror adventure game developed by Team GrisGris / GrindHouse released for the PC. Corpse Party 2: Dead Patient Neues; is the definitive version of Dead Patient with updated graphics and additional scenario.

name: Super Vadimka X2
description: Super Vadimka X2 - is a free video game made by two developers VadimBallzGame and HyperTheLoopa420 for Windows. The game was released on April 9, 2023, and in North America in 2023. This is a direct sequel to Super Vadimka X, released in the same year. The action of Super Vadimka X2 takes place in the near future, a new opponent named Chris Chan wants to take over the world and kill the main character Super Vadimka X will the hero be able to survive a second time.

name: Toro to Kyuujistu
description:
Toro on Holiday is a Video Game developed by Bomber Express and published by Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

It was released on November 29, 2001 on the PlayStation 2. It is an exploration based game where the player travels through a Japanese town with Toro. It is most notable by its use of live footage for its environments.

name: Doko Demo Issyo: Watashi na Ehon
description:
Doko Demo Issho: My Picture Book is a video game developed by BeXide and published by Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.

It was released in April 24, 2003 on the PlayStation 2.

name: Doko Demo Issho: Toro to Ippai
description:
Word-based communication game in which you teach new words to Toro, who then passes the information on to a set of black cats known as Kuro.

It was released in September 2, 2004 on the PlayStation 2, and would mark the debut of Kuro. The game is compatible with the PS2's EyeToy accessory.

name: Shikyokusei
description: Turn-based tactics game developed by Kogado Studio's Usagi Team and released for Windows PCs in March, 2001.

name: Doko Demo Issho Portable
description: A remake for Doko Demo Issyo released in December 7, 2004 for it's 5th Anniversary. It included more customization options, such as new costumes for the Pokepi and decorative items that could be added to the players apartment. There were also additional environments the player could take their Pokepi to, including a school, a farm, a marketplace, and a city street.

name: Killbug
description: Killbug is a fast-paced, first-person movement shooter set in an endless arena. Slash and shoot your way through hordes of ravenous insects, mastering fluid aerial movement mechanics as you fight for glory on the leaderboards.

name: Mainichi Issho Portable
description:
Mainichi Issho Portable is the PlayStation Portable version of Mainichi Issyo, but has removed some features like customizing your Nyavatar, but it's mostly able to be played offline (presumably because of the PSP being a handheld system, thus having a different kind of online connection compared to the PlayStation 3.)

After the service ended in 2009, the console version was made inaccessible, although the PSP version is still playable in a limited form. The console version can also be played in a limited form offline through emulation by forcing a PlayStation Network connection, although all its online features are inaccessible.

name: 3D Xmas Adventure: Santa's Rescue
description: Armed with a magic candy cane that shoots jingles and sprinkles, you run around the North Pole gathering gifts, freeing grounded reindeer, and thawing out elves. Beware of the growling abominable snowmen and the menacing grinchy creatures!

name: Dimension X
description: F2P/P2E NFT game, built on the Flow Blockchain using Dapper wallet! ETH version coming soon!

name: Cherrywitched!
description: In Cherrywitched! You play as a witch detective for the Council of Witches who’s been struggling with a recent series of missing person cases. One day, you decide to take a break from work to visit your favorite cafe: Cherry Pie’s Cafe! This game takes place in the same universe as my first visual novel Berrywitched! So if you haven't played that game, please consider checking it out.

name: Toro to Typing
description: Toro to Typing is a typing-based adventure game based on the Japanese PlayStation game Doko Demo Issyo. The game series concept of communicating with and teaching a virtual pet-type character is integrated with typing prompts.

name: Onsen mo Issho
description: The follow-up to "Typing with Toro," a typing tutor game based on the Japanese PlayStation game Doko Demo Issyo. This time Toro and his friends are heading to a hot springs resort and will require your conversational typing prowess along the way. New minigames include karaoke, word games, snowman building, and others.

name: Doko Demo Issho: Toro's Story App
description: Doko Demo Issho: Toro's Story App was a mobile game made by Bexide and Sony Computer Entertainment Inc., which was released on May 18, 2006.

name: Toro's Story App: Heart Pounding Nya
description: Toro's Story App: Heart Pounding Nya was a mobile game made by Bexide and Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. that was released on November 6th 2006.

name: Junk Survivor
description: Junk Survivor is a zombie post-apocalypse game where you loot, craft, build and farm in a struggle to survive. With a vast map to explore, a robust skillset to unlock this customizable sandbox awaits the adventurer. How long before you die!

name: Who is the New Maid?
description: There is a rumor that the new maid is a lesbian. And a slut. You're Stephanie, the oldest of three sisters, and it is your responsibility to make sure the new maid fits in at the manor.

name: Pokémon Run & Bun
description:
Pokémon Run & Bun is at it's core a difficulty hack of Emerald, slightly inspired by games such as Emerald Kaizo and Radical Red, but offering a lot of new takes on ways to make battles interesting. Plenty of quality of life features will make sure you spend your time on the fun side of it instead of worrying about gruesome, tedious tasks.
The game features almost 500 battles, and all of them were designed with custom movesets and synergistic parties, making each trainer feel unique in it's own way within the world. You will not be stomping your way through battles here, you will simply be another trainer in the world, making your journey feel like an actual journey and not a slog.
Gym Leaders and Teams Aqua and Magma have been given extra attention and boss fights were added to complement the game. Each victory should feel rewarding.

name: Raging Bytes
description: Raging Bytes is a story-driven zombie RPG full of drama and pixels! Survive the raging bytes! With difficulty levels for all kinds of players, dive into this post-apocalyptic world and face zombies in turn-based battles!

name: Fatum Betula + Knights & Guns
description: Sin descripción

name: Jelly Lab Reloaded
description:
From the makers of Darklings, here comes the wiggly jiggly experience, Jelly Lab!
Lab Experiment goes wrong and you have to smack all jellies before it all collapses!
Prepare your fingers to ultimate showdown!

name: Double Smash Ninja
description: Double Smash Ninja is a challenging endless runner.

name: NachoCado
description: Jump right into the wacky battle of survival. Shot your nacho enemies down with your powerful seed, and watch them crumble to corn dust. Discover the true power of Avocado!

name: Space Lines
description: Sin descripción

name: Knights of Valour Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario Net Quest
description: Mario Net Quest is an online Adobe Shockwave game that was made during a partnership between IBM and Nintendo to promote IBM AS/400 servers.

name: New Club Penguin
description: New Club Penguin is a fan made continuation of the original Club Penguin, bringing it into the future.

name: Sonic: Project Survival
description: Sonic: Project Survival is a Sonic fan game that is Mega Drive-style Sonic platformer, with original zones based of classic games in the series.

name: The Capcom Collection
description:
The Evercade EXP features 18 built-in games from world famous publisher Capcom!
Out of the box, no download required, you’ll have access to 14 arcade greats and 4 home console classics including
Street Fighter II’: Hyper Fighting, Mega Man, Final Fight, Ghouls ‘n Ghosts, Strider, Breath of Fire (full games list below) and more including full TATE mode support!

name: Cheri La Bete
description:
The shut-in princess' first mission is making a pact with a dragon!
She departs, along with her trusty knight, but...

name: Ochakai he no Shoutaijou
description: An indie otome game about a tea party

name: Piggy: Chapter 1
description:
Piggy kidnapped you!

Therefore, you will have to escape from the house by solving puzzles and using objects to get out of that place.

name: Bloons But You're the Bloon
description: Bloons is a popular online game where players use a monkey character to pop balloons bloons using various weapons and tools. In this version of the game, "Bloons but you're the bloon," the player takes on the role of a bloon and must evade being popped by the monkey characters. As the bloon, the player will navigate through different levels, each with their unique challenges and obstacles. The player must avoid the monkey's attacks, such as darts, bombs, and boomerangs, and find ways to get past the monkey's defenses. To do this, the bloon has a range of abilities and upgrades that can be earned throughout the game. The player can customize their bloon by choosing different types of bloons, each with unique abilities and weaknesses. As the player progresses through the game, the monkey characters become more challenging, and the levels become more difficult. The ultimate goal of the game is to make it through all the levels without getting popped by the monkeys.

name: Quiz Quest
description:
Quiztal Games introduces Quiz Quest: a mind-stretching, collaborative quizcapade!

Team up with friends and family, using your smartphones as your controllers, and put your heads together as you journey to achieve the rank of Master Quizards.

The fallen knight Sir Answerlot needs you to take up his failed quest to rid the kingdom of its most hated tormentor: the evil dragon Spontanius the Combustor. You will need to keep your wits about you as you encounter many allies and enemies, make many crucial decisions and answer many, many quiz questions along the way.

name: TBS Mini-Golf
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Quest
description: Step into a lengthy and varied gameplay experience featuring solo dungeons, co-op PVE dungeons, and ranked PVP! Choose your starting hero from a nostalgic cast - Warrior, Mage, or Rogue - and then forge your strategy as you progress through a deep, fully customizable skill tree and seek out powerful new items.

name: Magic Bubble
description: A component albeit very blatant clone of Bust-a-Move aka Puzzle Bobble. There is also a version labeled the "Adult Version" which features images of naked women in the background, completely uncensored. Groovy.

name: Kiwi Farm
description: Set in the exotic island of New Zealand, you can grow and decorate your Kiwi Vine up into the sky and harvest juicy kiwis. You will discover more surprises the higher you go.Manage your adorable kiwi friends and bees to pollinate, harvest and collect your kiwis.

name: A Turtle In A Hare-Machine
description: An erotic horror game.

name: Ukik
description: Sin descripción

name: Munasawagi no Season
description: Romance drama CD story, with illustrations by Ayumi Hattori. It features interviews with the voice actors and two minigames.

name: Idol Tantei You&My
description: Romance drama CD story, featuring interviews with the voice actors and two minigames.

name: Chou Ga Shin Zangard
description: Drama CD story, featuring interviews with the voice actors and two minigames.

name: Kaitou Elf Liely
description: Drama CD fantasy story, featuring interviews with the voice actors and two minigames.

name: OpenQuiz
description: An intellectual game where you can spend time with your friends.

name: HarleQuest!
description: 3D roguelike dungeon crawler currently in development for the Sega Dreamcast and PC.

name: Beautiful Indie Worlds Bundle
description: Two beautiful indie stories in one bundle!

name: Louie Lucha
description: Body-slams and elbow-drops with a side of guacamole! Battle bizarre opponents using simple one-tap controls as you play energizing mariachi melodies to fuel Louie's rage. The addicting, fast paced gameplay is wrapped in vibrant hand-crafted visuals full of personality. Two different game modes give you multiple ways to progress!

name: Bubble Bubbling
description: Match at least Four bubbles in one line to get scores.

name: Therapist: Mind Manager
description: Therapist: Mind Manager is a visual novel with simulation elements set on modern times, following the life of an ordinary man working as a psychotherapist.

name: Planarity
description: It is a browser-based puzzle game based on planar graphs. Set how many vertices you want, whether you want the line to highlight if it is not touching another and untangle to your heart's content. It is a re-code of John Tantalo's original game that no longer functions due to lack of flash support.

name: The Deep Ones
description:
In a mysterious little town, inhabited by a strange tackle shop owner, the deep waters are stirring...

Explore the foggy landscape and try to fill out your fish species logbook. Purchase items and upgrades to help you catch stronger and rarer fish. But beware, these fish won't be caught without a fight - they may just drag you down with them!

name: Pleonexia
description:
"Play as the fisherman of a quiet little sea-side town called Pleonexia. Relax as you fish and listen to the waves. As long as the townsfolk are fed, everyone will be happy and nothing will ever go wrong. Don't look under the surface." Brought to you by Portal Emulator.

A black-and-white 2D point-and-click horror game about the life of a fisherman.

name: Truth Loop 2
description:
"TRUTH LOOP 2" is a short game (approximately 5 minutes), with a scary story and bizarre moments...

It has a "LOOP" style of gameplay, you keep repeating an action while the game and the story progress.

name: LazinAround
description: LazinAround is a puzzle game that will put your laser puzzling and color theory skills to the test. Master the increasingly complex puzzles by manipulating multiple lasers into a single color. Figure out how to combine different colored lasers together to hit the matching colored targets. Use the colored filter crystals to tune the lasers to the proper color. Hitting the matching colored target is the goal. Just don't hit them with the wrong color.

name: The Door
description: The Door is a short supernatural horror game made in a month for "The Forgotten Tapes: Analog Nightmares", and the debut game for it's developer.

name: Angels
description:
In 48K mode, you get full gameplay with one additional loading after the third level.
In 128K mode, the game uses many additional features: additional types of enemies, a variety of punches, cutscenes, effects, in-game AY music, advanced intro and final cut and more. The game has 1 Player and 2 Players modes. Default keys: QAOP + Space + H to change character. You can define keys in the main menu. With every punch you accumulate energy. You can use super strike when the energy is maximum. To do this, hold the fire key, but before you need to move away from the enemy.

name: Ghostwire Tokyo: Spider's Thread
description:
The city’s denizens have been replaced by beings from another world - yōkai, evil spirits, myths and urban legends brought to life. But now isn’t the time to fear the unknown…face it in Ghostwire: Tokyo, now featuring the all-new Spider’s Thread update!

The Spider’s Thread update, available now for all Ghostwire: Tokyo players, adds a new rogue-lite mode to the game on top of other additions to the base campaign, including new enemies, new skills, new areas to explore, new side missions, extended story cinematics, Photo Mode enhancements, new trophies/achievements and more!

name: Oha Suta Dance Dance Revolution GB
description: A version of the Dance Dance Revolution GB series focusing on songs from OhaSuta, a Japanese morning childrens television program.

name: Omatsuri Quest Hippare-Q
description: A divergent experience-based variety arcade game is now available! A humorous festival quest that everyone can enjoy. It is a new game that can be played together by up to 3 people, such as cooperative play and battles! You can play 12 kinds of festivals (stages). Make full use of the operation method and aim to clear the target score!

name: Infinite Slice
description: Addictive & minimalist game for all ages.

name: Pro Skiing
description: Your lifelong dream is to become an Olympic skier. Now the time has come to see whether you can make it happen. Put on your old skis and navigate through a number of deadly obstacle courses on your way to glory or remain forever forgotten in this cruel reality that we call life.

name: Soccer Heroes RPG
description:
Welcome to the best RPG fantasy soccer cards game! Become one of the greatest football heroes playing with your dreamteam over the world! Play as a soccer captain and manage your players to win every match! Soccer Heroes is the best fantasy soccer game ever!
Pass, dribble, shoot and goal! Experience real soccer as you create your own football dreamteam signing new players as a captain. Choose your soccer cards, level up and evolve your soccer heroes and score amazing goals in this manga soccer game!
Download Soccer Heroes, the ultimate football manager, and start scoring goals and managing your dreamteam to victory!

name: Animal Hot Springs
description:
"Animal Hot Springs" is an idle 'casual' management game.
Run your hot springs successfully to make it the most popular place ever.
You can earn acorns from animals visited.
Buy various bath items and upgrade the facilities with your acorns.

name: Astro Rush
description:
Race through space and dodge the obstacles at breakneck speed.
Take control of two meteorites in this fast-paced high score game while you rush through a trippy galaxy. Rotate the meteorites through the obstacles. If you fail once, you will have one meteorite left and switch from rotating to dodging controls. You can play in normal mode or in three different wireframe modes.

name: Ins and Outs
description: Play hundreds of free puzzles in casual play mode and get promoted through the ranks. Or race against the clock in competitive play mode to solve as many puzzles as you can in one minute, and dare your friends to beat your score while you compete for a spot on the global leaderboards. Solve puzzles without lifting your finger and with as few lines as possible for extra points and stars!

name: Tall Chess
description: Play with beautiful pieces and boards.

name: BlockPath
description: To solve the puzzle draw a path to fill out entire board. Don't be fooled by the simplicity, it's not as easy as it looks. Give it a try!

name: Sanga
description: Seek the Sanga!

name: Rhythm Rabbit
description: A fast-paced rhythm action game where you automatically move on the beat of the music, but the amount of steps changes on each move. React fast in order to progress or end up dying repeatedly.

name: Jazz Jackrabbit CD-ROM
description: Sin descripción

name: Penitent Dead
description: PSX Fantasy Horror. There are whispers that the Endlyss have arisen. As a Knight of the Black Order, you have been called upon to investigate.

name: Kurumi Miracle
description: Kurumi Miracle is a Adventure/Simulation video game published by Banpresto released on September 25th, 1997 for the Sony PlayStation.

name: Magical Medical
description: Magical Medical is a RPG video game published by Konami released on September 10th, 1998 for the Sony PlayStation.

name: Legends of Bezogia
description: Dive into Legends of Bezogia, an MMORPG where you play as a Bezogi in a magical world, crafting weapons to defeat trolls, keyboard warriors, and the FUD King. Engage in quests, PVP, and PVE instances for endless fun, using memes and community tools for immersive gaming experience

name: Tennis Manager 2023
description:
The new Tennis Manager arrives on May 25, 2023 just before Roland Garros. Discover in a few days the presentation of the new features by clicking on the "follow" button and adding the game to your wishlist.
This year Tennis Manager puts team spirit first. Be there !
